name: pachysandra
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an evergreen bush (= one that never loses its leaves) that grows thickly and close to the ground and is sometimes used in gardens to stop weeds from growing: The best place to plant pachysandra is in a moist, well-drained soil. She put thick wooden planks down to make a border for the pachysandra.
More examplesFewer examplesPachysandra is suitable for shaded locations.I like to have some pachysandra in the garden as it offers both flowers and interesting foliage.I noticed some daffodils growing among the pachysandra.
